          <title>
            <string language="sl">Nastanek prvih visokih kultur - osmica</string>
            <string language="en">Rise of first civilizations - word search puzzle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anstieg erste Zivilisationen - 
Wortsuchpuzzlespiel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élévation de premières civilisations - puzzle 
de recherche de mot</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ascensão de primeiras civilizações - enigma da
busca da palavra</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Aumento delle prime civilizzazioni - puzzle di 
ricerca di parola</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοδος των πρώτων πολιτισμών - γρίφος αναζήτησης 
λέξης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Subida de las primeras civilizaciones - 
rompecabezas de la búsqueda de la palabra</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Iskanje besed v črkovni mreži povezanih z nastamkom prvih visokih kultur.</string>
            <string language="en">Finding the terms in the character mesh related to the rise of the first civilizations.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">namakanje</string>
            <string language="en">irrigation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">civilizacija</string>
            <string language="en">civilization</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">osmica</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trgovina</string>
            <string language="en">commerce</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Finden der Bezeichnungen im 
Zeichenineinandergreifen stand auf dem Anstieg der ersten 
Zivilisationen in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Trouvant les limites dans la maille de caractère
liée à l'élévation des premières civilisations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Encontrar os termos no engranzamento do caráter 
relacionou-se à ascensão das primeiras civilizações.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'individuazione dei termini nella maglia del 
carattere si è riferita all'aumento delle prime civilizzazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βρίσκοντας τους όρους στο πλέγμα χαρακτήρα σχετικό με
την άνοδο των πρώτων πολιτισμών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Encontrando los términos en el acoplamiento del 
carácter relacionado con la subida de las primeras civilizaciones.</string>
          </description>
